def is_remote_control_found():
    # Function to check if the remote control is found
    symbol remote_found=exists rc: item : is_remote_control(rc) and visited(rc)
    return remote_found

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if is_remote_control_found():
            bind rc: item where:
                is_remote_control(rc) and visited(rc)
            achieve close_char(char, rc)
        else:
            foreach rc: item:
                if is_remote_control(rc) and not visited(rc):
                    observe(rc, "Check if its the remote control")

behavior turn_on_television(remote_control: item, television: item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(television)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and close_char(char, remote_control)
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and facing_char(char, television)
        turn_on_television(remote_control, television)

behavior turn_on_television():
    body:
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        achieve close_char(char, tv)
        assert facing_char(char, tv)
        achieve is_on(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        foreach television: item:
            if is_television(television) and not is_on(television):
                bind remote_control: item where:
                    is_remote_control(remote_control) and close(remote_control, television)
                turn_on_television()
